bioAsHtml: Software Architecture and Agility are my current main centers of interest, as levers allowing me to simplify I.T.for my fellow coworkers, for projects stakeholders, and for operational teams. I try to leverage the best from what I've learned in order to (hopefully) achieve neat design and insightful software. improving the collaboration between business, development and operations. On the side I created and am still involved in various open source projects. I am president since 2010 of the Java User Group of Luxembourg (YaJUG), Organizer of Voxxed Days Luxembourg, I've spoken in multiple conferences, and co-initiated the Devops Mercenaries.
bio:
Software Architecture and Agility are my current main centers of interest, as levers allowing me to simplify I.T.for my fellow coworkers, for projects stakeholders, and for operational teams.
I try to leverage the best from what I've learned in order to (hopefully) achieve neat design and insightful software. improving the collaboration between business, development and operations.
On the side I created and am still involved in various open source projects. I am president since 2010 of the Java User Group of Luxembourg (YaJUG), Organizer of Voxxed Days Luxembourg, I've spoken in multiple conferences, and co-initiated the Devops Mercenaries.
